post.author: 김태희
post.content:
G10은 한빛소프트와 한국 소프트 진흥원이 투자하여 설립한 회사이며, 한국 온라인 게임의 진흥을 위해 micro-billing (온라인 게임 결재)를 담당하고 있습니다. 저희 프로덕트인 GoCash Game Card는 현재 게임스탑에서 팔리고 있고, 2010년에는 전국 Gas Stations의 convenience stores를 비롯하여 7Eleven 과 Walgreens에도 출시될 계획에 있습니다.
아래 내용 확인하시고 지원해 주시기 바랍니다.
___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Location: Los Angeles, CA
Employee Type: Full Time or Part Time
Title: Assistant Systems Engineer

G10 VMS, Inc., a professional online game card provider (www.gocashgamecard.com), is currently looking for a highly motivated candidates.


Job Description

- to maintain and administrate a computer system and network in online game prepaid solution and systems
- Cisco Firewall/ AD/ MS SQL 2005 Server
- C#, Jscript, ASP.NET, HTML, XML, CSS, AJAX, PHP, SOAP Web Services, etc
- B.S in CS, CE, EE, OR related field exp. OR CCNA / MCSE

Requirements

- Must read/write/speak - English/Korean
- Must be eligible to work in the U.S. (Present Proof of Eligibility)
- Probation period: 3 month fulltime thereafter


Send Resume to : austin@g10vms.com
post.title: Assistant Systems Engineer (한인업체)
